message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1200000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I have to consider the value I've placed on the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $1100000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far apart. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on it, and it's within my budget.

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go below $1050000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $1050000.

I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit far apart. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on it, and it's getting closer to my budget.
